passages.text:
It's not a very large town, but it looks to be the trade hub for the local region. Several farmers have stalls to sell produce, and there's a smithy with several weapons on display - not common for a small town. There's also a tavern.

[[Smithy->Smithy]]
[[Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Forest->Forest]]
passages.cleanText: It's not a very large town, but it looks to be the trade hub for the local region. Several farmers have stalls to sell produce, and there's a smithy with several weapons on display - not common for a small town. There's also a tavern.
passages.name: Town Center

passages.text:
It's too early for the place to be full, but there's still a few faces around.

The publican looks up from his chores waiting to see if you want something.

[[Leave Tavern->Town Center]]
passages.cleanText:
It's too early for the place to be full, but there's still a few faces around.

The publican looks up from his chores waiting to see if you want something.
passages.name: Tavern

passages.text:
As you come to your senses you look around. You are on an old dirt track, one end leads up a mountain and the other heads towards a town in the far distance.

You decide it's probably best to go to the village for now given you can barely remember your name.[[Continue to the Village->Town Center]]
passages.cleanText:
As you come to your senses you look around. You are on an old dirt track, one end leads up a mountain and the other heads towards a town in the far distance.

You decide it's probably best to go to the village for now given you can barely remember your name.
passages.name: Old Dirt Path

passages.text:
A smith hammers away at some crude iron while his apprentice works the forge. Noticing he has a customer, the smith lets out a piercing whistle and another apprentice comes in from a side room to serve you.

[[Leave Store->Town Center]]
passages.cleanText: A smith hammers away at some crude iron while his apprentice works the forge. Noticing he has a customer, the smith lets out a piercing whistle and another apprentice comes in from a side room to serve you.
passages.name: Smithy

passages.text:
Deep in the forest, there's excitement to be found.

[[Find a fight->Forest Battle]]
[[Go through the Woods->Mountain Pass]]
[[Return to Village->Town Center]]
passages.cleanText: Deep in the forest, there's excitement to be found.
passages.name: Forest

passages.text:
A gruff fellow with the garb of an adventurer sits by an impromptu barricade, with a used halberd resting across his legs.

"Trying to get through the pass?" he asks.

When you nod your reply he sighs and says "Sorry lad, can't let you through here. Bandits have taken up camp and are taking travellers for everything they have. The town's paid me and some mates to clear them out but until they get here I'm not to let anyone through who can't handle themselves."

He sizes you up... "You're not quite there yet, I'm afraid."

[[Return to Forest ->Forest]]
